survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and challenges related to digital workspace ergonomics, including hardware, software, and environmental factors impacting productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current digital workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current digital workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific ergonomic challenges you face in your digital workspace.
questions.routing_logic: Display if Q2 != 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific ergonomic challenges you face in your digital workspace.
script.routing_logic: Display if Q2 != 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or rest your eyes during your workday?
answer_options: I do not take regular breaks
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed for certain roles.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or rest your eyes during your workday?
answer_options: I do not take regular breaks

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Randomize options to avoid order bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the brightness and positioning of your primary work screen?
answer_options: Poor - causes eye strain or discomfort
questions.client_notes: Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How would you rate the brightness and positioning of your primary work screen?
answer_options: Poor - causes eye strain or discomfort

questions.question_text: Does your organization provide ergonomic assessments or equipment reimbursements?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'I prefer not to answer' option for anonymity.

script.question_text: Does your organization provide ergonomic assessments or equipment reimbursements?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital workspace ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Allow for detailed feedback. Limit response to 1000 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital workspace ergonomics?

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working at your digital workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard range for consistency in data analysis.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working at your digital workspace?

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall productivity in relation to your digital workspace ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Consider pairing this with a follow-up qualitative question.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall productivity in relation to your digital workspace ergonomics?
